ARABIC: وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And put your trust in Allah. Allah suffices as a Guardian.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Trust in God. God is sufficient as guardian.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Put your trust in Allah: Allah is sufficient as Guardian.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Trust in God and be sure that He is a Sufficient Guardian.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And trust Allah; and Allah is Sufficient as a Trustee.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And put your trust in Allah, and sufficient is Allah as a Trustee.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And rely on Allah; and Allah is sufficient for a Protector.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And put thy trust in God; God suffices as a guardian.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And put thy trust in Allah, for Allah is sufficient as Trustee.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Put your trust in God; God is sufficient as a Guardian.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And put thy trust in Allah and Allah sufficeth as a Trustee.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And put your trust in Allah; Allah suffices as trustee.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And put thy trust in Allah, and enough is Allah as a disposer of affairs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And put your trust in Allah, and Sufficient is Allah as a Wakil (Trustee, or Disposer of affairs).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: put your trust in Allah; Allah suffices as a Guardian.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And put your trust in God. God is enough as a trustee.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And rely upon Allah; and sufficient is Allah as Disposer of affairs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [33:3] And put your trust in God, regarding this affair of yours; and God suffices as Guardian, to preserve you. And [the members of] his [the Prophet’s] community are subject to the same [admonitions] in all of the above.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And put thy trust in Allah, for Allah is Sufficient as Trustee) He is sufficient to fulfil His promise to you: to give you victory and the upper hand; it is also said that this means: He is sufficient to protect you from them.
